Title: Web Styles in Native Apps
Description: Styles meant for web apps can be easily shared with native mobile/desktop apps—developers also have the flexibility to tinker with styling on the fly.

Description: Increase the reliability of MSAL.NET with IHttpClientFactory, benefiting from automatic DNS lookup, TCP connection reuse, and HttpMessageHandler pipeline extensibility.

Description: In this post, I describe how to stop a PowerShell script when an error occurs using the $ErrorActionPreference and $PSNativeCommandUseErrorActionPreference variables
